attributes.action: Hold a public enquiry into how Magistrates convicted Aspinal when HE was assaulted
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The police lied to the court, the evidence was blatant and was viewed by the bench. The nation is shocked and somehow magistrates found the accused guilty! There should be a public enquiry into the case as well as having part-time judges in the justice system who are too ready to believe Police and convict innocent people.

rejection.details:
Please supply full name and address information.
Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
